question: Which global technology firm has launched an e-commerce venture called ‘Shops’?
explanation:
Global Technology major Facebook has ventured into the e-commerce sector by launching a new feature called ‘Shops’.
This new feature enables small businesses to set up their stores on Facebook and Instagram for free. It will be facilitated by third-party eCommerce services such as Shopify, BigCommerce, and Woo. This initiative is expected to assist small businesses amid the ongoing economic crisis.
